definition[0]: used when you are trying to make someone feel less anxious
example[1]: Don’t worry if you can’t finish all the questions.
definition[1]: used to tell someone that they do not need to do something
example[2]: Don’t worry about sorting them out – I’ll do it later.
definition[2]: used to tell someone that you will definitely do something
example[3]: Don’t you worry, I’ll make sure he does his fair share.
